tuv.seg: <f0>As 3d artists we have the ability to create photo real images.
<f0>作为3D艺术家，我们有能力创建具有照片真实感的图像。
An artist can model a photo realistic head in 3d but it will look lifeless if the eyes lacks depth.</f3>
艺术家可以建造一个具有照片真实感的3D头部，但是如果没有深度刻画眼睛，那么这个人看起来也是没有生命的。</f3>
You may find that this eye reminds you of older style dolls.
你会发现，这种眼睛会让你想起老式的洋娃娃。
I'm an artist so I'll fake it.
我是一个艺术家，所以我会模仿着做。
Lets look at the eye
我们来看这个眼睛
Tutorial: Its all in the Eyes
教程：眼睛建模合集
Now I'm no surgeon so I'm not going to chart out the entire structure of an eye.
不过，我不是医生，因此也不打算画出眼睛的完整结构。
We can compare this to body language.
我们可以那它和肢体语言做个对比。
One way to do this is to pay great attention to the eye ball.
做到这一点的方法是对眼球要赋予极大的关注。
However you may have never thought about it consciously.
然而，你自己可能从来没有想过这个问题。
So how do we create depth?
那么，我们如何深度刻画呢？

In some small cases this is enough such as background extras, or characters that will be shaded in a special way etc. (click </f0><b1><a2>here</a2></b1><f3> for an example of a sphere and texture map eye created by me) However I tend to subscribe to the Pixar's belief that the eye needs a lot of attention in order to convey life.
在一些不常见的情况下，这么做是可以的，比如：作为背景的时候，或者人物被某种方式遮挡的时候等等。 (点击</f0><b1><a2>这里</a2></b1><f3> 可以看到我做的球帖图实现的眼睛)但是我还是倾向于Pixar（皮克斯动画工厂）的说法：想表达得栩栩如生，就得在眼睛上多下功夫。
To me, a lifeless eye can ruin an image.
对我来说，一个没有生命的眼睛足足可以毁掉整幅作品。
From this we can assume that they didn't use a simple sphere with a texture map.
有此我们可以看出来，他们没有使用简单的球贴图方式。
Eyes show inner thought because they have depth to them.
眼睛可以表明内心想法（原文：Eyes show inner thought because they have depth to them.）。
Eyes
眼睛
We can tell when a human is feeling sad by looking at their "pose" and the way they move slowly and kind of careless.
通过看一个人的“姿态”我们可以发现他现在很悲伤，这种姿态可以是移动缓慢，还有点漫不经心。
At some level we read the eye ball without even knowing how or why certain looks evoke an emotion.
在某种程度上，我们甚至不用知道眼球和感情的关系就能读懂它们。
The eyes of this sad subject may be more wet because of tears and their movement may be slowed, maybe even timid.
悲伤的眼睛看起来应该是湿乎乎的布满泪水，移动缓慢甚至还有点胆怯。
One thing to remember is that if it looks good... its good enough.
有一点要记住的是，如果它看起来很不错...就足够了。
Also the eyes will kind of stare at something symbolizing a more focused inner thought.
眼球也可以盯着某一物体来表明它正在关注一样东西。
In fact this suggests they've modeled the eye more physically correct.
事实上，这表明他们做的眼睛物理准确度很高。
By Adam Baroody
由Adam Baroody创作
In that case we must pay great attention to detail when it comes to relating the thought, or emotion that we're trying to convey to our audience.
在这种情况下，我们必须高度重视每个细节，尤其是它和我们试图传达给观众的想法和情感相关的时候。
When I set out to figure out how to make a better eye for my characters i thought about dolls and the way their eyes were shaped and how they looked.
当我着手为我的人物创建一个更棒的眼睛时，我想起了那些洋娃娃的眼睛形状和观感。
The most simplest form is a texture map on a sphere.
最简单的方法是一给球物体贴图。
Creating a character is one thing but creating a character in 3d that has depth is another.
创建一个角色是一回事，但在3D里面创建一个角色则完全是另一回事。
Well like i sad, a sphere with texture map works for some scenes especially if its a more cartoony or stylized character, and its even better if there's a bump map as well.
那么，比如我想表达伤心，球贴图的方式表现得还可以，尤其是在一些卡通/典型的人物上的话。当然，如果有个凹凸贴图效果更好。
But we can further more tell that they are sad by the way their eyes look and move.
但是眼睛的关注点和移动则可以把这一点表现得更清楚。
In life, the eye is a window to the soul.
在生活中，眼睛是灵魂的窗户。
However looking at Pixar's "A Bugs Life, we see a lot of depth in the eyeball.
但是请看看Pixar的电影"A Bugs Life(虫虫危机)", 我们就会在里面看到很多的对眼球的细节刻画。
Believe it or not this is all common sense, your mind knows all of these things.
不管你信不信，这都是常识，你的脑子知道如何处理。
That's what we do.
这就是我们要做的。
Before we look at the eye.
不过在我们关注眼睛之前，我要插几句。
